skills.name: Sonic Boom
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with a strong sonic boom and removes a beneficial effect with a 75% chance.

skill_effect.name: Remove Buff
skill_effect.description: Removes one or more beneficial effects from target monster(s)

skills.name: Dark Blast
skills.description: Attacks all enemies to decrease their Attack Speed for 2 turns. The damage of this skill will increase according to your MAX HP.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skills.multiplier_formula: <mark>ATK</mark> + 0.16*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Poison Mist
skills.description: Attacks all enemies, weakens their Defense and deals Continuous Damage for 2 turns. The damage of this attack is proportionate to your MAX HP.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skills.multiplier_formula: 0.28*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>
